sentences.en: He had a rather forbidding, saturnine manner.
sentences.cn: 他的举止相当乖戾阴郁，令人望而生畏。

sentences.en: The face was saturnine and swarthy, and the sensual lips seemed to be twisted with disdain.
sentences.cn: 他皮肤黝黑, 面带讥讽表情,嘴里叼着烟斗,是个鞑靼人.

sentences.en: With Mr Heathcliff, grim and saturnine, on the one hand, and Hareton, absolutely dumb, on the other, I made a somewhat cheerless meal, and bid adieu early.
sentences.cn: 在我的一边坐的是希刺克厉夫先生，冷酷而阴沉，另一边是哈里顿，一声也不吭，我吃了一顿多少有点不愉快的饭，就早早的辞去了。

words.tran_cn: 忧郁的；阴沉的；铅中毒的；沉默寡言的

trans.tran_cn: 性格阴沉的，表情忧郁的，讥讽的
trans.tran_en: looking sad and serious, especially in a threatening way
